Producer: Bernd Eichinger, Avi Arad, Ralph Winter
Rating: PG (Sequences of Action Violence|Innuendo|Some Mild Language)
Synopsis: Reed (Ioan Gruffudd), Susan (Jessica Alba), Johnny (Chris Evans) and Ben (Michael Chiklis) face an intergalactic messenger who has arrived to prepare Earth for its destruction. While the enigmatic being wreaks havoc around the world, the heroic quartet must also contend with the unexpected return of their enemy, Victor Von Doom.
Title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
